title: Independent Review: Audit MASTER_PLAN.md updates for Jan 20 Data Crisis -- Deep Context Verification
Verify BUG-336: Single Ctrl+Z restores Shift+Deleted task in Tauri
description:
Test steps:
1. Run npm run tauri dev
2. Create a task on canvas
3. Select task and press Shift+Delete
4. Confirm deletion in modal
5. Press Ctrl+Z ONCE

Expected: Task should reappear immediately (no double press needed)

Root cause fixed: Dual undo system was calling both refHistoryInstance.undo() AND performSelectiveUndo(), consuming one undo action on VueUse (which does nothing in operation-aware mode).

title: Tauri: Improve migration command to detect local vs remote Supabase
description:
**Problem:** The Tauri startup runs `supabase db push` which fails without a linked remote project. Quick fix applied: added `--local` flag.

**Proper solution needed:**
1. Detect whether running against local or remote Supabase
2. Use `--local` flag only for local dev
3. Consider if migrations should even run on app startup (vs. during build/deploy)
4. Handle errors gracefully - don't block app startup for migration failures

**Files:** src-tauri/src/lib.rs:182-202, src/composables/useTauriStartup.ts
close_reason: Implemented auto-detection: checks for .supabase/project-ref to determine local vs remote. Uses --local flag only when no remote project is linked.
